body_html: @Evpok Yes model.eval() for ScriptModule is not supported yet. You can still use the dropout layer for training. For inference, a workaround would be: stay in the training mode and set the batch_size = 1, that will make it behave the same as model.eval()
body_text: @Evpok Yes model.eval() for ScriptModule is not supported yet. You can still use the dropout layer for training. For inference, a workaround would be: stay in the training mode and set the batch_size = 1, that will make it behave the same as model.eval()
body: @Evpok Yes `model.eval()` for ScriptModule is not supported yet. You can still use the dropout layer for training. For inference, a workaround would be: stay in the training mode and set the batch_size = 1, that will make it behave the same as `model.eval()`
